message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. Given its value, I think a starting price of $15,000 is fair.  What do you think?
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but $10,000 is quite a bit lower than I'm aiming for. How about we meet closer to the middle at $13,500?
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I'm still a bit hesitant to pay $13,500. How about we compromise at $11,500?
